testcase.classname: Verify the sign in of the user
testcase.name: Verify successful login with valid data - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the base url of the application.......................................passed Given the user enters into the sign in page.................................passed When the user enters the "sushmag@example.com" and "Password123!"...........passed And the user clicks on sign in button.......................................passed Then the user will be redirected to the main page...........................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the sign in of the user

Try again or create an account." message.passed

testcase.classname: Verify the sign in of the user
testcase.name: Verify whether the account is blocked after 3 invalid attempts - Example #1.2

failure.message: expected [Incorrect email or password. Try again or create an account.] but found [Your account is temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please try again later.]
